post.description: Use this API to get the cashier page address. After getting the cashier page address, you can redirect the user to the cashier page to make a payment.

resultStatus.description:
The result status. Valid values are:

S: indicates that the result status is successful.
F: indicates that the result status is failed. 
U: indicates that the result status is unknown.

region.description:
The 2-letter country or region code. For more information, see ISO 3166 Country Codes standard. 

More information:

Maximum length: 2 characters

state.description:
The state, country, or province name. 

More information:

Maximum length: 8 characters

city.description:
The city, district, suburb, town, or village name. 

More information:

Maximum length: 32 characters

address1.description:
Address line 1, for example, the street address, PO box, and company name.

More information:

Maximum length: 256 characters

address2.description:
Address line 2, for example, the apartment, suite, unit, and building information. 

More information:

Maximum length: 256 characters

zipCode.description:
ZIP or postal code.

More information:

Maximum length: 32 characters

bankAccountNo.description:
The international bank account number.

The standardized formats in different areas are:

Brazil: ^[0-9]{0,20}$ such as 123456789
More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

accountHolderName.description:
The full name of the account holder.

The standardized formats in different areas are:

Brazil: ^[A-Za-z0-9/() .,\-?:'+]{0,50}$
More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

swiftCode.description:
The eight-character or eleven-character BIC or SWIFT code of the bank.

Specify this parameter when the bank card issuing country is Brazil.  

More information:

Maximum length: 11 characters

bankRegion.description:
The region where the bank is located. 

The value of this parameter is a 2-letter region or country code that follows the ISO 3166 Country Codes standard.  

More information:

Maximum length: 2 characters

accountHolderType.description:
The type of the account holder. Valid value are:

INDIVIDUAL: indicates that the account holder is an individual.
ENTERPRISE: indicates that the account holder is an enterprise.  
More information:

Maximum length: 32 characters

routingNumber.description:
The routing number. See Bank routing number for valid values.

Specify this parameter when the issuing bank is in Brazil.  

More information:

Maximum length: 9 characters

branchCode.description:
The branch code of the bank. See Bank branch code for valid value s.

Specify this parameter when the issuing bank is in Brazil.  

More information:

Maximum length: 32 characters

accountHolderTIN.description:
The tax identification number (TIN) of the account holder.

For the account holder in Brazil:

If the account holder is an individual, the value of this parameter is an eleven-character tax ID known as CPF. 
If the account holder is a legal entity, the value of this parameter is a fourteen-character tax ID known as CNPJ. 
Specify this parameter when the issuing bank is in Brazil.  

More information:

Maximum length: 32 characters

accountType.description:
The bank account type. Valid values are:

CHECKING: indicates the checking account, also known as the current account. 
FIXED_DEPOSIT: indicates the fixed deposit account. 
Specify this parameter when the issuing bank is in Brazil.  

More information:

Maximum length: 13 characters

bankName.description:
The name of the bank.

Specify this parameter when the card issuing country is the United States.  

More information:

Maximum length: 256 characters

accountHolderAddress.description:
The address of the account holder.

Specify this parameter when the card issuing country is the United States or Canada.

iban.description:
The International Bank Account Number (IBAN) used to identify a bank account.

Specify this parameter when the card issuing country is the United Kingdom or belongs to the European Union.  

More information:

Maximum length: 34 characters

updateRequestId.description:
The unique ID that is assigned by the marketplace to identify an update request for settlement information. Alipay uses this field for idempotence control. 

More information:

This field is an API idempotency field.For registration requests that are initiated with the same value of registrationRequestId and reach a final status (resultStatus = S or F), the same result is to be returned for the request.
Maximum length: 64 characters

referenceMerchantId.description:
The unique ID that is assigned by the marketplace to identify the seller.  

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

settlementCurrency.description:
The seller's settlement currency that is specified in the settlement contract. The value of this parameter is a 3-letter currency code that follows the ISO 4217 standard.  

More information:

Maximum length: 3 characters

settlementBankAccount.description: The seller's bank account that Alipay settles to.

result.description: The request result, which contains information such as status and error codes.

updateStatus.description:
The update status of the settlement information. The value of this parameter is fixed to PROCESSING. 

Get the settlement information update result from the notifyUpdate and inquireUpdate interfaces. 

This parameter is returned when the value of result.resultStatus is S.  

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters
